title: Klubokawiarnia Granda
typeOfFood: Vegan, International, Fast food, Beer/Wine, Take-out
description: Vegan cafe/coffee shop with fair trade products. Offers a large selection of teas, chocolate, coffee and plenty of food, including sweets. Is LGBTG friendly. Works with community organizations, organizing film screenings, discussions and debates. On weekends holds a wide variety of music concerts. On Friday evenings has tournament table football games.
